headline: Las Vegas Sands and the Thurgood Marshall College Fund Select 15 HBCU Students for 2025 Immersion in Las Vegas
summary: Sands Hospitality Immersion Program gives students a week-long, behind-the-scenes peek at the Las Vegas hospitality industry to inspire career exploration. LAS VEGAS, NV / ACCESS Newswire / August 21, 2025 /Published by Las Vegas Sands on May 15, ...
